original_title: LAUGFS Gas announces highest LPG price reduction
original_body_lines: LAUGFS Gas PLC, said yesterday it will be reducing the price of domestic gas cylinders with immediate effect. Considering the drop in gas prices in the global market, the company has decided to pass on the benefit directly to the customer. It also marks the highest price reduction for domestic cylinders by a gas supplier in Sri Lanka during the month of July. LAUGFS Gas has decided to reduce the domestic 12.5kg cylinder by Rs. 300 to Rs. 3690; and the domestic 5kg cylinder by Rs. 120 to Rs. 1476.

Customers can reach the LAUGFS Gas customer care team through 1345 for district-wise prices and further information. LAUGFS Gas being the most trusted and solidified LPG provider of the nation holds southeast Asia’s largest LPG storage and trans-shipment facility in Hambantota and ensures a continuous supply of LPG to the local market without any interruptions.
